author: lgo
msg: Fixed an issue where commit over ra_serf segfaulted.
Reason of the segfault is that an APR_EOF status code, indicating svn handled
the response to a message completely, was wrapped in an error object and
handled as an error, while it's actually the desired result. This is a
temporary fix to get commit working again. I guess the better fix would be
to stop wrapping desired status code(s) in error objects and just
returning APR_EOF to serf if svn handled the reponse completely.
(handle_checkout): treat an APR_EOF error as a correct result (but still

author: hwright
msg: Do a bit more deprecated function replacement, this time in libsvn_wc.
Replace svn_path_* functions with svn_dirent_/svn_uri_ equivalents.
